main_question: Why did thousands of miners come to the Yukon in the 1890s?
question: Why did thousands of miners come to the Yukon in the 1890s?
possible_answers: A. To build the transcontinental railroad
explanatory_sentence: Thousands of miners came to the Yukon in the 1890s because of the Klondike Gold Rush after gold was discovered, drawing prospectors seeking fortune.
